title: WTT: Bradley w/ Bat PSA 4 for SGC
author: jp1216

posts.post_title: WTT: Bradley w/ Bat PSA 4 for SGC
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/046_Bradley.jpg[/IMG]

I have a SGC graded Cleveland team set with one PSA card.  Sticks out like a sore thumb.  Anyone with a SGC graded Bradley Piedmont 350-460/25 back in similar grade want to trade?  I'd do a SGC 35, 40, 45, or 50.  Just don't want to wait and include it on my next SGC sub - which could be over a year from now.
